verses.verse: וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> Now Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <WH2204> was old בָּ֖א <WH935> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> in years וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You זָקַ֙נְתָּה֙ <WH2204> unto him Thou art old בָּ֣אתָ <WH935> [and] stricken בַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> in years וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> land נִשְׁאֲרָ֥ה <WH7604> and there remaineth הַרְבֵּֽה־ <WH7235> much מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> yet very לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to be possessed

זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> This [is] the land הַנִּשְׁאָ֑רֶת <WH7604> that yet remaineth כָּל־ <WH3605> all גְּלִיל֥וֹת <WH1552> all the borders הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגְּשׁוּרִֽי׃ <WH1651> and all Geshuri

מִֽן־ <WH4480> from הַשִּׁיח֞וֹר <WH7883> From Sihor אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> which [is] before מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> Egypt וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> far גְּב֤וּל <WH1366> even unto the borders עֶקְרוֹן֙ <WH6138> of Ekron צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> northward לַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> to the Canaanite תֵּחָשֵׁ֑ב <WH2803> [which] is counted חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <WH2568> five סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines הָעַזָּתִ֤י <WH5841> the Gazathites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִי֙ <WH796> and the Ashdothites הָאֶשְׁקְלוֹנִ֣י <WH832> the Eshkalonites הַגִּתִּ֔י <WH1663> the Gittites וְהָעֶקְרוֹנִ֖י <WH6139> and the Ekronites וְהָעַוִּֽים׃ <WH5757> Avims

מִתֵּימָ֞ן <WH8486> From the south כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> all the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> of the Canaanites וּמְעָרָ֛ה <WH4632> and Mearah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לַצִּידֹנִ֖ים <WH6722> that [is] beside the Sidonians עַד־ <WH5704> far אֲפֵ֑קָה <WH663> unto Aphek עַ֖ד <WH5704> far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> to the borders הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> of the Amorites

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> And the land הַגִּבְלִ֗י <WH1382> of the Giblites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> and all Lebanon מִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> east side מִבַּ֣עַל גָּ֔ד <WH1171> from Baalgad תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> below הַר־ <WH2022> under mount חֶרְמ֑וֹן <WH2768> Hermon עַ֖ד <WH5704> far לְב֥וֹא <WH935> unto the entering חֲמָֽת׃ <WH2574> into Hamath

כָּל־ <WH3605> All יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> All the inhabitants הָ֠הָר <WH2022> of the hill country מִֽן־ <WH4480> from הַלְּבָנ֞וֹן <WH3844> from Lebanon עַד־ <WH5704> far מִשְׂרְפֹ֥ת מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4956> unto Misrephothmaim כָּל־ <WH3605> all צִ֣ידֹנִ֔ים <WH6722> [and] all the Sidonians אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אוֹרִישֵׁ֔ם <WH3423> them will I drive out מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel רַ֠ק <WH7535> but הַפִּלֶ֤הָ <WH5307> only divide thou it by lot לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> unto the Israelites בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> for an inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> I צִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <WH6680> as I have commanded

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now חַלֵּ֞ק <WH2505> Now therefore divide אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> for בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> for an inheritance לְתִשְׁעַ֣ת <WH8672> unto the nine הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <WH7626> tribes וַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and the half הַשֵּׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> of Manasseh

עִמּ֗וֹ <WH5973> the other הָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> With whom the Reubenites וְהַגָּדִ֔י <WH1425> and the Gadites לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> have received נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> their inheritance אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֜ם מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> which Moses בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> them beyond הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> eastward כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֔ם מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> [even] as Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <WH6177> From Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> that [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <WH5158> of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <WH769> Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <WH5892> and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <WH5158> of the river וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַמִּישֹׁ֥ר <WH4334> and all the plain מֵידְבָ֖א <WH4311> of Medeba עַד־ <WH5704> far דִּיבֽוֹן׃ <WH1769> unto Dibon

וְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> and all עָרֵי֙ <WH5892> And all the cities סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> which reigned בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon עַד־ <WH5704> far גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> unto the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְהַגִּלְעָ֞ד <WH1568> And Gilead וּגְב֧וּל <WH1366> and the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֣י <WH1651> of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֗י <WH4602> and Maachathites וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> and all הַ֥ר <WH2022> and all mount חֶרְמ֛וֹן <WH2768> Hermon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> and all Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> far סַלְכָֽה׃ <WH5548> unto Salcah

כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֥וּת <WH4468> All the kingdom עוֹג֙ <WH5747> of Og בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> in Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> which reigned בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <WH6252> in Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <WH154> and in Edrei ה֤וּא <WH1931> he נִשְׁאַר֙ <WH7604> who remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <WH3499> of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֔ים <WH7497> of the giants וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> smite מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> for these did Moses וַיֹּרִשֵֽׁם׃ <WH3423> and cast them out

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִ֙ישׁוּ֙ <WH3423> expelled בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Nevertheless the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <WH1651> not the Geshurites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <WH4602> nor the Maachathites וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> dwell גְּשׁ֤וּר <WH1650> but the Geshurites וּמַֽעֲכָת֙ <WH4601> and the Maachathites בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> among יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> the Israelites עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> until this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

רַ֚ק <WH7535> but לְשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> Only unto the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> he gave נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> none inheritance אִשֵּׁ֨י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel ה֣וּא <WH1931> he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> [are] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> as he said לֽוֹ׃ ס

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> gave מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> unto the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> of Reuben לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> [inheritance] according to their families

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become לָהֶ֜ם <WH1992> like הַגְּב֗וּל <WH1366> And their coast מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <WH6177> was from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> that [is] on the bank נַ֨חַל <WH5158> of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <WH769> Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <WH5892> and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <WH5158> of the river וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַמִּישֹׁ֖ר <WH4334> and all the plain עַל־ <WH5921> by מֵידְבָֽא׃ <WH4311> by Medeba

חֶשְׁבּ֥וֹן <WH2809> Heshbon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֶ֖יהָ <WH5892> and all her cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּמִּישֹׁ֑ר <WH4334> that [are] in the plain דִּיבוֹן֙ <WH1769> Dibon וּבָמ֣וֹת בַּ֔עַל <WH1120> and Bamothbaal וּבֵ֖ית בַּ֥עַל מְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1010> and Bethbaalmeon
וְיַ֥הְצָה <WH3096> And Jahazah וּקְדֵמֹ֖ת <WH6932> and Kedemoth וּמֵפָֽעַת׃ <WH4158> and Mephaath
וְקִרְיָתַ֣יִם <WH7156> And Kirjathaim וְשִׂבְמָ֔ה <WH7643> and Sibmah וְצֶ֥רֶת הַשַּׁ֖חַר <WH6890> and Zarethshahar בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in the mount הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> of the valley
וּבֵ֥ית פְּע֛וֹר <WH1047> And Bethpeor וְאַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <WH794> and the slopes הַפִּסְגָּ֖ה <WH6449> of Pisgah וּבֵ֥ית הַיְשִׁמֽוֹת׃ <WH1020> and Bethjeshimoth

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> And all the cities הַמִּישֹׁ֔ר <WH4334> of the plain וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all מַמְלְכ֗וּת <WH4468> and all the kingdom סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> which reigned בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הִכָּ֨ה <WH5221> smote מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> whom Moses אֹת֣וֹ ׀ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> with the princes מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> of Midian אֶת־ <WH853> אֱוִ֤י <WH189> Evi וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֙קֶם֙ <WH7552> and Rekem וְאֶת־ <WH853> צ֤וּר <WH6698> and Zur וְאֶת־ <WH853> חוּר֙ <WH2354> and Hur וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֔בַע <WH7254> and Reba נְסִיכֵ֣י <WH5257> [which were] dukes סִיח֔וֹן <WH5511> of Sihon יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> dwelling הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the country

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְעָ֥ם <WH1109> Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> also the son בְּע֖וֹר <WH1160> of Beor הַקּוֹסֵ֑ם <WH7080> the soothsayer הָרְג֧וּ <WH2026> slay בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> did the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> with the sword אֶל־ <WH413> among them חַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2491> that were slain

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become גְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> And the border בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> of Reuben הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> was Jordan וּגְב֑וּל <WH1366> and the border זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֤ת <WH5159> [thereof] This [was] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children רְאוּבֵן֙ <WH7205> of Reuben לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם <WH4940> after their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH2691> and the villages פ

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> gave מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> [inheritance] unto the tribe גָ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> [even] unto the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> according to their families

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> And their coast יַעְזֵר֙ <WH3270> was Jazer וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and all the cities הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead וַחֲצִ֕י <WH2677> and half אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon עַד־ <WH5704> far עֲרוֹעֵ֕ר <WH6177> unto Aroer אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7237> Rabbah

וּמֵחֶשְׁבּ֛וֹן <WH2809> And from Heshbon עַד־ <WH5704> far רָמַ֥ת הַמִּצְפֶּ֖ה <WH7434> unto Ramathmizpeh וּבְטֹנִ֑ים <WH993> and Betonim וּמִֽמַּחֲנַ֖יִם <WH4266> and from Mahanaim עַד־ <WH5704> far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> unto the border לִדְבִֽר׃ <WH1688> of Debir

וּבָעֵ֡מֶק <WH6010> And in the valley בֵּ֣ית הָרָם֩ <WH1027> Betharam וּבֵ֨ית נִמְרָ֜ה <WH1039> and Bethnimrah וְסֻכּ֣וֹת <WH5523> and Succoth וְצָפ֗וֹן <WH6829> and Zaphon יֶ֚תֶר <WH3499> the rest מַמְלְכ֗וּת <WH4468> of the kingdom סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan וּגְבֻ֑ל <WH1366> and [his] border עַד־ <WH5704> far קְצֵה֙ <WH7097> [even] unto the edge יָם־ <WH3220> of the sea כִּנֶּ֔רֶת <WH3672> of Chinnereth עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> eastward

זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> after their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2691> and their villages

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> gave מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> [inheritance] unto the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become לַחֲצִ֛י <WH2677> and [this] was [the possession] of the half מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> by their families

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become גְבוּלָ֗ם <WH1366> And their coast מִמַּחֲנַ֨יִם <WH4266> was from Mahanaim כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּשָׁ֜ן <WH1316> all Bashan כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וּת ׀ <WH4468> all the kingdom ע֣וֹג <WH5747> of Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֗ן <WH1316> of Bashan וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חַוֹּ֥ת <WH2333> and all the towns יָאִ֛יר <WH2971> of Jair אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> which [are] in Bashan שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> threescore עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> cities

וַחֲצִ֤י <WH2677> And half הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> Gilead וְעַשְׁתָּר֣וֹת <WH6252> and Ashtaroth וְאֶדְרֶ֔עִי <WH154> and Edrei עָרֵ֛י <WH5892> cities מַמְלְכ֥וּת <WH4468> of the kingdom ע֖וֹג <WH5747> of Og בַּבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> in Bashan לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> [were pertaining] unto the children מָכִיר֙ <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> [even] to the one half בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children מָכִ֖יר <WH4353> of Machir לְמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> by their families

אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> These אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִחַ֥ל <WH5157> did distribute for inheritance מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> These [are the countries] which Moses בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab מֵעֵ֛בֶר <WH5676> on the other side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> Jordan יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> by Jericho מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> eastward ס

וּלְשֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <WH7626> But unto the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> not [any] inheritance יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel ה֣וּא <WH1931> he נַחֲלָתָ֔ם <WH5159> [was] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> as he said לָהֶֽם׃
